My email is no longer working. Is this a Comcast. net problem or a Thunderbird problem? You have me in your database per my original set-up which is still correct. Can the issue be due to ne update requirements?

1500949,2025-03-21 18:32:20 -0700,2025-04-10 03:52:59 -0700,en-US,thunderbird,I have a corrupted TBird. Can it be repaired or replaced without lost of saved message folders.,false,,,false,1724747,1720303;1724747;,import-and-export-email,thunderbird;import-and-export-email;,artstar,"

Hello I have already reports these issues but did not receive constructive how to correct them. I'll try to be more precise this round.

Thunderbird Issues Summary:

  • Received new messages in the inbox repeat in list multiples (not consistent)
  • Messages deleted to trash repeat back into the inbox (sometimes also in multiples rounds)
  • Notifications in settings non-functional (disappeared)/ Incoming email alerts popup and remain on my screen. 
  (I have to manually close them one by one.)
  • Mutliple unwanted sub-folders appear and reappear even after multiple attempts to delete them.

There are more issues but not as prominent as the above.

I use an old iMac. (See image)Us there there is an older TB I can download which is compatible with my system? IF it comes to that, HOW do I safeguard all my saved messages to move into the new version? Please advise. Thank you Rob

",artstar;davidsk;wsmwk;,true,true,false,;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.13; rv:109.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/115.0,2,0,0,,,

1500951,2025-03-21 18:48:12 -0700,2025-03-28 11:01:26 -0700,en-US,thunderbird,Imap folders,true,1721706,"{""username""=>""davidsk"", ""display_name""=>""david"", ""avatar""=>""https://firefoxusercontent.com/5eed5ecf74d9e1ec85435ea262bc016e""}",false,1721796,1720318;1720562;1720572;1721628;1721706;1721790;1721796;,email-and-messaging,thunderbird;email-and-messaging;,dmischel1,"

When Tbird first began it was easy to see which folders were Imap and which were local. That distinction disappeared a while back and I still had all my imap folders but no indication of which were which. When I want to access them the popup menu did show ""gmail"" (since that is my email domain) and the imap folders there. But when I go to create a new folder it does not show up in the imap list even though I want it to be an imap folder.

How do I create/manage an imap folder in the current Tbird?

",dmischel1;davidsk;,true,false,false,";useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;solver_id:6580440",7,0,0,,,

I updated, then I un-installed, then re-installed Ver 136, but still no confirmation request. after shift -delete. Highlighted Messages were immediately deleted with no confirm message displayed. What do I do to reinstate the ""confirmation required"" prompt?

",seagull117;sfhowes;,true,false,false,";useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/132.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 OPR/117.0.0.0;solver_id:6580683",1,0,3,,,

Buongiorno. Utilizzo TB portable versione 136.0.1, volevo inserire un altro account ma vedo che e' sparita l apposita opzione. Ho rilevato invece una novita nella sezione strumenti: la voce

Centro account Sperimentale Crea account nel nuovo Centro account

Quindi, come posso creare un nuovo account? Grazie

A calendar item with reminders will not edit or delete. This repeatedly pops up reminders days after the event. No, the ""Read Only"" box in Calendar Settings is not checked (refers to a similar fault reported by someone 9 years ago!). The calendar is tied to my Google calendar, and it is NOT present there, having been deleted.

1501048,2025-03-22 10:12:13 -0700,2025-03-22 10:28:40 -0700,en-US,thunderbird,Won't send E-mail,false,,,false,1720381,1720381;,send-and-receive-email,thunderbird;send-and-receive-email;,mmckenna2101,"

I set up Thunderbird using the settings supplied to me from Spectrum for third party E-mail clients.

Incoming and outgoing

DSN: mail.twc.com port: 993

outgoing:

DSN: mail.twc.com port: 587

Incoming mail works fine, outgoing times out trying to log in to server.

Same server for in and out. In works, out doesn't

",mmckenna2101;christ1;,true,false,false,";useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/134.0.0.0;kb_visits_prior:[""/en-US/kb/faq-changing-imap-pop""]",1,0,2,,,

1501058,2025-03-22 11:39:49 -0700,2025-03-22 11:39:49 -0700,en-US,thunderbird,Deleting email causes strange effects,false,,,false,,"",accessibility,firefox-13601;firefox-1360;seg-not-firefox;thunderbird;accessibility;,cranleighboy,"

On deleting an email the pane which lists all emails (?message list?, top right) is cleared and the only way to restore it that I have found is to close Thunderbird & reload. Strangely this process a) says that Thunderbird is still running; b) creates a new extra drafts folder (Drafts-1) with the same content as the original Drafts folder; and c) creates a new folder named Drafts.msf-X.compact-backup. I have tried reverting to an old version; and have installed the latest (136.0.1) to no avail. This occurred a week or so ago if my memory is correct.

",cranleighboy;,true,false,false,";useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;ff_version:136.0.1;os:Windows 10 (up to date);troubleshooting:Troubleshooting Information

This page contains technical information that might be useful when you’re trying to solve a problem. If you are looking for answers to common questions about Thunderbird, check out our support website.

1501061,2025-03-22 11:51:25 -0700,2025-03-24 00:06:38 -0700,nl,thunderbird,E-mailadressen koppelen,false,,,false,1720661,1720661;,import-and-export-settings,thunderbird;import-and-export-settings;,adri.huijgens,"

Beste Thunderbird-gebruiker, Hoe kan ik adressen die ik al heel lang gebruik met Thunderbird op mijn pc overzetten naar de opnieuw geïnstalleerde laptop? Alle e-mailberichten - zowel binnengekomen als verzonden e-mailberichten zijn wel gekoppeld. Dus, hoe kan ik al de door mij al jaren bij Thunderbird in gebruik zijnde e-mailadressen overzetten op Thunderbird op mijn laptop?

",adri.huijgens;markh2;,true,false,false,";useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/133.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 CCleaner/133.0.0.0",1,0,0,,,

Why do emails from Rumble keep going into junk folder? I have been correcting these individually for several months but they still go into junk mail. Hope this isn't a political issue. R. Malott

1501083,2025-03-22 14:57:52 -0700,2025-03-23 09:46:13 -0700,en-US,thunderbird,Suddenly can't send or receive gmail emails,true,1720535,"{""username""=>""nancyrtague"", ""display_name""=>""Nancy"", ""avatar""=>""https://profile.accounts.firefox.com/v1/avatar/N""}",false,1720535,1720416;1720448;1720535;,send-and-receive-email,thunderbird;send-and-receive-email;,nancyrtague,

Yesterday afternoon emails suddenly stopped going out. I sent an email successfully at 2:18 p.m. At 2:57 p.m. I couldn't get anything to send. Today the problem persists.

I have not changed anything. My roommate also uses Thunderbird and has not had any problem. I've compared my settings to hers and they seem to be the same. I have closed and reopened Thunderbird with no improvement.

I'm using Thunderbird 128.8.1esr (64 bit). I'm including images of the error message and the server settings.

Thanks for any help. Nancy

,nancyrtague;wsmwk;,true,false,false,";useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;solver_id:6582419",3,0,0,,,"{""username""=>""wsmwk"", ""display_name""=>""Wayne Mery"", ""avatar""=>""https://firefoxusercontent.com/3f0645137479a481e67f7fb3ff1d945b""}"

To my new computer Thunderbird has just fetched the INBOX-mails from the IMAP-server, not my many subfolders, not the SENT-folder, not the SPAM-folder. This has previously worked when I changed to a new computer. How do I get Thunderbird to transfer these mails.
